Summary: it was so small to me it was so far up in the sky at night...
divs: Sighting Detailsit was mid July and we had had a cook out for the whole family. Me,my 2 sisters,my dad, and my step mom where out on the back porch after the cook out and i was looking up at the stars and then something caugt my eye it look like a shooting star it was very high in the sky it was moving so very fast in all sorts of different directions like it was drawing something in the crystal clear night sky it was taking very sharp turns almost impossile for a human to make such sharp turns so quickly..At first i thought it ws a shooting star but then i relized thar shooting stars so in one straight direction and didnt last thon at all this was a 15-20 min. prieod my dad said it was shooting star to try not to scare me but i knew he that he knew that it wasnt tht next moring i look up ufo scitings on google and i found some that looked identical to what i saw the night befor. My name is billy and i go to north laurel middle school in london,KY
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around July 18th 2008
